sentences.sContent: But while thirst is a good indicator that you are suffering from dehydration, your body can give you earlier warning signs that it's time to take a swig.
sentences.sContent_eng: But while thirst is a good indicator that you are suffering from dehydration, your body can give you earlier warning signs that it's time to take a swig.
sentences.sCn: 但是尽管口渴是脱水了的暗示，身体会更早发出警告信号，该是痛饮的时候了。
